info.name: Facebook Black (by pfeiffer stylez)
info.description: A black Facebook theme. Choose from 28 different backgrounds. If you don't like the plain black background, use one of my background generators: - Black Themes (6 wallpapers) - Galaxy Themes (6 wallpapers) - Autumn Themes (8 wallpapers) - Retro Cicles (6 color sets) ... or try the Monster High add-on. Compatible with the Social Fixer browser extension.
info.additionalInfo: The previes shows the "Granite" background from the Black Themes background generator. Facebook is changing constantly. Let me know if you notice any issues with this style. Become a fan of my themes on Facebook. ChangeLog Dez 15, 2014 update for the new search function Dez 01, 2014 update for apps.facebook.com and comment placeholders Nov 22, 2014 update for the comment section Nov 06, 2014 update for the search dropdown Oct 24, 2014 quick patch for the messages flyout Oct 19, 2014 rearranged graphic ressources Oct 18, 2014 quick fix the the floating CP Oct 10, 2014 added an icon to the "Missed Stories" nav item Sep 24, 2014 update for newsfeed sub pages Sep 22, 2014 update for the admin panel Sep 11, 2014 SFx compability update Sep 05, 2014 update for the admin panel Aug 22, 2014 update for the newsfeed right column, and some small tweaks Aug 01, 2014 hotfix for select menus Jul 31, 2014 update for the messages page Jul 30, 2014 another update for the nav bar -.-" Jul 24, 2014 update for the nav bar Jul 12, 2014 update for the search result pages Jul 02, 2014 update for the nav bar Jun 28, 2014 all graphic elements now with https protocol Jun 08, 2014 fix for the tags Jun 04, 2014 quick update for the sidenav edit buttons May 28, 2014 fix for some input fields May 18, 2014 update for search results May 07, 2014 update for the sidenav edit buttons May 06, 2014 small fix for option menus Apr 29, 2014 fix for a groups popup Apr 28, 2014 update for the chat Apr 24, 2014 update for the sidenav icons Apr 21, 2014 fix for messages Apr 20, 2014 improved UI menus and reduced box shadow Apr 14, 2014 version 3, rebuilt from scratch
